trans-unit.source: Lines FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Lines FastTab

trans-unit.source: Master BOMs represent the product structure as a type of resource list, therefore there is no separation between BOMs and routing.

seg-source.mrk: Master BOMs represent the product structure as a type of resource list, therefore there is no separation between BOMs and routing.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Lines FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of BOM line. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the type of BOM line.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: <blank> – This option is mainly used to insert a comment in a manufacturing BOM.

seg-source.mrk: <blank> – This option is mainly used to insert a comment in a manufacturing BOM.

trans-unit.source: Account (G/L) – This option allows for the selection of a G/L account.

seg-source.mrk: Account (G/L) – This option allows for the selection of a G/L account.

trans-unit.source:
Item – With this option an item from the item list can be registered as a component of a BOM.
  • If an item possesses a Master BOM, this is considered automatically and transferred to the Document BOM / Construction Line, if the Part Type field is set to Production in the item card.
  • If the Part Type field is set to Standard, the item is treated as the standard.
  • If the Part Type is set to Purchase, the item is treated as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV but a variant code will be created automatically when the status of a Document BOM or Construction Line is changed to Released.

seg-source.mrk: Item – With this option an item from the item list can be registered as a component of a BOM.
• If an item possesses a Master BOM, this is considered automatically and transferred to the Document BOM / Construction Line, if the Part Type field is set to Production in the item card.
• If the Part Type field is set to Standard, the item is treated as the standard.

• If the Part Type is set to Purchase, the item is treated as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV but a variant code will be created automatically when the status of a Document BOM or Construction Line is changed to Released.

trans-unit.source: If the Information Line check box is selected in the Document BOM setup, then the components from items with the Part Type field of Standard or Purchase are copied into a Document BOM.

seg-source.mrk: If the Information Line check box is selected in the Document BOM setup, then the components from items with the Part Type field of Standard or Purchase are copied into a Document BOM.

trans-unit.source: Resource – With this option, resources can be selected. The use of resources in the Master BOM is useful when indirect ranges (e.g. construction) in the parts list are captured and related to the value to be considered. If no Manufacturing modules are used, resources replace the function of work centers and/or machine centers.

seg-source.mrk: Resource – With this option, resources can be selected.
The use of resources in the Master BOM is useful when indirect ranges (e.g. construction) in the parts list are captured and related to the value to be considered.
If no Manufacturing modules are used, resources replace the function of work centers and/or machine centers.

trans-unit.source: Work Center – Selection of a job for a processing step.

seg-source.mrk: Work Center – Selection of a job for a processing step.

trans-unit.source: Machine Center – Selection of a group of jobs for a processing step.

seg-source.mrk: Machine Center – Selection of a group of jobs for a processing step.

trans-unit.source: Master BOM – Selection of another Master BOM. The components of this Master BOM will not be transferred as its own assembly group, but will be copied directly into the current BOM level.

seg-source.mrk: Master BOM – Selection of another Master BOM.
The components of this Master BOM will not be transferred as its own assembly group, but will be copied directly into the current BOM level.

trans-unit.source: Production BOM – Used with the integration to cc|process manufacturing (refer to section “cc|process manufacturing” on page 1.

seg-source.mrk: Production BOM – Used with the integration to cc|process manufacturing (refer to section “cc|process manufacturing” on page 1.

seg-source.mrk: Delete Status

trans-unit.source: Delete reservation, if this instruction from the PDM interface was deleted (only relevant when using a PDM system).

seg-source.mrk: Delete reservation, if this instruction from the PDM interface was deleted (only relevant when using a PDM system).

seg-source.mrk: Position – Position 3

trans-unit.source: Reference to the design item number of a CAD design. The fields are for informational purposes only.

The fields are for informational purposes only.

trans-unit.source: No.

seg-source.mrk: No.

trans-unit.source: Number of the appropriate items, resources, work center, machine center, or a G/L account.

seg-source.mrk: Number of the appropriate items, resources, work center, machine center, or a G/L account.

trans-unit.source: Variant

seg-source.mrk: Variant

trans-unit.source: Standard Task Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Standard Task Code for the master BOM line.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Standard Task Code for the master BOM line.

trans-unit.source: Description – Description 5

seg-source.mrk: Description – Description 5

trans-unit.source: Descriptions from the Item Card. The item descriptions are copied into the Master BOM and can be changed if necessary.

The item descriptions are copied into the Master BOM and can be changed if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Calculation Group Code

seg-source.mrk: Calculation Group Code

trans-unit.source: Groups items, work centers, machine centers, resources, or G/L accounts for calculation purposes (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation Groups in Order.htm#_Ref310435968" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calculation Groups in Order-Related BOMs” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Groups items, work centers, machine centers, resources, or G/L accounts for calculation purposes (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation Groups in Order.htm#_Ref310435968" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calculation Groups in Order-Related BOMs” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Routing Link Code

seg-source.mrk: Routing Link Code

trans-unit.source: Connects material with a processing step. In the order completion process, the Routing Link Code is used to assign material submitted to an external manufacturing processing step.

seg-source.mrk: Connects material with a processing step.
In the order completion process, the Routing Link Code is used to assign material submitted to an external manufacturing processing step.

trans-unit.source: Enclosure

seg-source.mrk: Enclosure

trans-unit.source: Indicates material submitted for an external manufacturer (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Subcontracting with Supply.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Subcontracting with Supply of Material” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates material submitted for an external manufacturer (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Subcontracting with Supply.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Subcontracting with Supply of Material” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Enclosure Drop Shipment

seg-source.mrk: Enclosure Drop Shipment

trans-unit.source: Indicates material provided for external processing that must be drop shipped to the vendor.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Configuration.htm#_Ref351308230" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Configuration” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Configuration.htm#_Ref351308230" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Configuration” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Quantity

trans-unit.source: Indicates the quantity of this component. If nothing is entered in the Formula Quantity field, then this field is used in the calculation (refer to the Formula Quantity field).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the quantity of this component.
If nothing is entered in the Formula Quantity field, then this field is used in the calculation (refer to the Formula Quantity field).

trans-unit.source: With work centers and machine centers, this field is used for the calculation of the time requirement according to the following formula:

seg-source.mrk: With work centers and machine centers, this field is used for the calculation of the time requirement according to the following formula:

trans-unit.source: Time requirement = Tr + Te/ Lot size * Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Time requirement = Tr + Te/ Lot size * Quantity

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: When opening the Master BOM in a Document BOM, the contents of this field are transferred to the Exp. Quantity field.

seg-source.mrk: When opening the Master BOM in a Document BOM, the contents of this field are transferred to the <span class="Bold">Exp.
Quantity field.

trans-unit.source: Unit of Measure Code

seg-source.mrk: Unit of Measure Code

trans-unit.source: Quantity unit of measure from the components.

seg-source.mrk: Quantity unit of measure from the components.

trans-unit.source: Calculation Formula

seg-source.mrk: Calculation Formula

trans-unit.source: Determines how to calculate the Quantity field. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines how to calculate the Quantity field.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: <blank>

seg-source.mrk: <blank>

trans-unit.source: Quantity = Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity = Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Length

seg-source.mrk: Length

trans-unit.source: Quantity = Length * Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity = Length * Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Length * Width

seg-source.mrk: Length * Width

trans-unit.source: Quantity = Length * Width * Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity = Length * Width * Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Length * Width * Depth

seg-source.mrk: Length * Width * Depth

trans-unit.source: Quantity = Length * Width * Depth * Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity = Length * Width * Depth * Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Weight

seg-source.mrk: Weight

trans-unit.source: Quantity = Weight * Quantity per

seg-source.mrk: Quantity = Weight * Quantity per

trans-unit.source: Length

seg-source.mrk: Length

trans-unit.source: Identifies a length measurement. If this measurement should be calculated with the help of the configuration feature, it is necessary to insert an attribute with a formula. The attribute is defined on the Dyn. BOM FastTab of the Configure to Order Setup page in the Variable for Length field.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies a length measurement.
If this measurement should be calculated with the help of the configuration feature, it is necessary to insert an attribute with a formula.
The attribute is defined on the <span class="Bold">Dyn.
BOM FastTab of the Configure to Order Setup page in the Variable for Length field.

trans-unit.source: Base Material

trans-unit.source: Identifies the assignment of a Base Material to the item. View Link

trans-unit.source: Operation No. / Previous Operation No. / Next Operation No.

seg-source.mrk: Operation No.
/ Previous Operation No.
/ Next Operation No.

trans-unit.source: Have the same function as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV routings. In the Master BOM line, these fields only work if Type = Work Center or Machine Center.

seg-source.mrk: Have the same function as in standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV routings.
In the Master BOM line, these fields only work if Type = Work Center or Machine Center.

trans-unit.source: If each field in the line is empty, no checks are done when the Master BOM is certified. If any field is populated and:

seg-source.mrk: If each field in the line is empty, no checks are done when the Master BOM is certified.
If any field is populated and:

trans-unit.source: Routing Type = Serial, the Operation No., Previous Operation No. and Next Operation No. fields will be populated automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Routing Type = Serial, the Operation No., Previous Operation No.
and Next Operation No.
fields will be populated automatically.

trans-unit.source: Routing Type = Parallel, the Operation No. and Next Operation No. fields must be populated manually. The Previous Operation No. field will be populated automatically (standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV).

seg-source.mrk: Routing Type = Parallel, the Operation No.
and Next Operation No.
fields must be populated manually.
The Previous Operation No.
field will be populated automatically (standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV).

trans-unit.source: Refer to <MadCap:xref href="Example Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Parallel Operation No.

seg-source.mrk: Parallel Operation No.

trans-unit.source: Provides a simplified process for defining parallel routings (refer to <MadCap:xref href="Example Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Provides a simplified process for defining parallel routings (refer to <MadCap:xref href="Example Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Parallel Routings in CTO BOMs” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Transfer to Sales Document

seg-source.mrk: Transfer to Sales Document

trans-unit.source: Determines if the Document BOM (where Type = Item) will be transferred to the current Sales Quote/Order lines (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Transfer Components to Sales Order.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Transfer Components to Sales Order” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the Document BOM (where Type = Item) will be transferred to the current Sales Quote/Order lines (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Transfer Components to Sales Order.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Transfer Components to Sales Order” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Type Production Structure

seg-source.mrk: Type Production Structure

trans-unit.source: Used with the integration to cc|process manufacturing (refer to section “cc|process manufacturing” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Used with the integration to cc|process manufacturing (refer to section “cc|process manufacturing” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Lines FastTab, Line Menu

seg-source.mrk: Lines FastTab, Line Menu

trans-unit.source: The following menu items appear on the Line menu, accessed from the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: The following menu items appear on the Line menu, accessed from the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Attributes: Opens the Master BOM Attributes page, which displays the attributes that were assigned to the Master BOM line. Attributes can also be assigned manually here.

seg-source.mrk: Attributes: Opens the Master BOM Attributes page, which displays the attributes that were assigned to the Master BOM line.
Attributes can also be assigned manually here.

trans-unit.source: Item - Master BOM: Opens the Item - Master BOM page when line Type = Item.

seg-source.mrk: Item - Master BOM: Opens the Item - Master BOM page when line Type = Item.

trans-unit.source: Characteristic Search Tree: Opens the Characteristic Search Tree page where an item can be searched using characteristics (refer to topic “Search Characteristics” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Characteristic Search Tree: Opens the Characteristic Search Tree page where an item can be searched using characteristics (refer to topic “Search Characteristics” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Cut: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures from the same or a different Master BOM to be cut and copied to the clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: Cut: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures from the same or a different Master BOM to be cut and copied to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Copy: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures from the same or a different Master BOM to be copied to the clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: Copy: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures from the same or a different Master BOM to be copied to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Paste: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures that were copied to the clipboard from the same or a different Master BOM to be inserted here.

seg-source.mrk: Paste: Enables individual items, multiple items and complete structures that were copied to the clipboard from the same or a different Master BOM to be inserted here.

trans-unit.source: Comments: Comments can be informatively entered. The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Comments: Comments can be informatively entered.
The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Tools: Tools information can be informatively entered. The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Tools: Tools information can be informatively entered.
The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Personnel: Personnel information can be informatively entered. The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Personnel: Personnel information can be informatively entered.
The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Quality Measures: Quality measures can be informatively entered. The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Quality Measures: Quality measures can be informatively entered.
The meaning and handling correspond to standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Line Texts: Opens the Edit Text page, where line-related text can be stored. Refer to topic “cc|text module” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Line Texts: Opens the Edit Text page, where line-related text can be stored.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="cc text module.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“cc|text module” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.
